Summary: this ufo is a reacurring event.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is an unknown object that has been apearing frequently off and on for some time. We were able to film this object for the 1st time tonite, for aprox 3min.. I also witnessed a different multi ship event last week. Please help!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Avalon
There were no other sightings in Avalon on or around July 24th 2013
